title: Remove caffeine.ai link from site footer

requirements.text: In frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx, remove the footer hyperlink that points to https://caffeine.ai (the "caffeine.ai" anchor element with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer") from the copyright line.

quotes:
href="https://caffeine.ai" 
              target="_blank" 
              rel="noopener noreferrer"
              className="text-navy-primary hover:underline"
            > REMOVE THIS FROM THE FOOTER.TSX

acceptanceCriteria: The rendered footer no longer contains any clickable link to https://caffeine.ai.
No reference to the string "https://caffeine.ai" remains in frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx.
The rest of the footer layout (including the copyright text, heart icon, and other links) continues to render without visual or runtime errors.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change any other social links (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram).
Do not change footer styling beyond what is required to remove the caffeine.ai link.
Do not implement Privacy Policy/Terms pages (these can remain as placeholder href="#").
